rooms.name: beach
rooms.description:
You find yourself at a empty beach. If you would not be stranded, this would be a nice place for holiday. 
In the sand there are some debris of your sunken ship. You need to find a way to get home again!

ways.name: lagoon
ways.description: a lagoon with some washed up boxes from you sunken ship

ways.name: cave on the beach
ways.description: entrance to a cave near the sea

ways.name: hill
ways.description: a little hill on a clearing

items.name: backpack
items.description: a backpack where you can store some additional items

items.name: life jacket
items.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

rooms.name: cave on the beach
rooms.description:
You enter the cave which have been created by the waves crashing against the stone wall. It smells fishy in here. 
At the end of the cave you see something like a skeleton of a pirate.

ways.name: beach
ways.description: the beach where this nightmare started

ways.name: cave system
ways.description: the cave goes deeper, but it's pretty dark in there

items.name: saber
items.description: a rusty saber of the pirate
items.place: is in the belt buckle of the pirate skeleton

items.name: rum
items.description: a old dusty bottle of rum
items.place: lies next to the pirate skeleton

items.name: telescope
items.description: a golden telescope

rooms.name: lagoon
rooms.description:
You walk along a long lagoon which protrudes into the sea. All over the place are parts of your sunken ship at the beach. 
It seems your the only person which was washed up at this huge beach.

ways.name: beach
ways.description: the beach where this nightmare started

items.name: swimming goggles
items.description: swimming googles which seem to be fine

items.name: coconut
items.description: a fresh coconut
items.place: lies next to a palm tree

items.name: shell
items.description: a pretty nice

rooms.name: hill
rooms.description:
You walk through a little forest and end up before a little hill. You climb up the hill so you have a better overview and can orientate yourself. 
On top of the hill you can all almost over the island. Maybe you can get even a little higher!

ways.name: beach
ways.description: the beach where this nightmare started

ways.name: viewing platform
ways.description: you climb up a ladder to the treetop. Here is a little viewing platform where you can see over the island

ways.name: rundown hut on the hill
ways.description: the way to an old rundown hut on the hill

items.name: apple
items.description: some delicious apple
items.place: lies in the dirt next to an huge apple tree

items.name: apple
items.description: another delicious apple
items.place: lies in the dirt next to an huge apple tree

items.name: rotten apple
items.description: this apple doesn't look that delicious
items.place: lies in the dirt next to an huge apple tree

rooms.name: viewing platform
rooms.description:
You climb up a ladder which is placed at the apple tree. When you reached the top end of the ladder you see is a little viewing platform. 
On this viewing platform you can see over the whole island. It's really huge and you can only guess what's in the distance. 
Maybe some item can help you to get a more detailed look.

ways.name: hill
ways.description: down to the hill near the beach

items.name: rusty key
items.description: This key looks very old ...
items.place: lies between to wood planks on the ground

rooms.name: rundown hut on the hill
rooms.description: You stand before a very old rundown hut on the hill next to the apple tree. There are no windows so you can't see whats in there and the door is locked.

ways.name: hill
ways.description: down to the hill near the beach

items.name: bow and some arrows
items.description: A bow out of wood

items.name: broken bottle
items.description: a wine broken bottle

items.name: homemade knife
items.description: a homemade knife

rooms.name: Cliff above the ship graveyard
rooms.description:
You can smell the sea and feel the spray on your face. Your standing on top off a cliff site with reefs in the sea and many ship wracks in the water. 
And a big old ship wrack connecting the cliff top with the boulder and beach below.

ways.to: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: plank
ways.description: an old plank connection the deck of the ship with the cliff

ways.name: path
ways.description: a beaten path to a small camp site

ways.name: stream path
ways.description: path runs alongside a stream

rooms.name: Camp site
rooms.description: There is a tent, a small fire place and some trunks. The tent looks like its been standing there for quit some time but still seems to be in use.

ways.name: path
ways.description: a beaten path to a small camp site

items.name: Rum
items.description: a bottle of rum

rooms.name: Deck of an old stranded ship
rooms.description:
You have boarded an old three mast sailing ship. Everything is creaking and roting. 
One mast is completely gone, one is still standing with torn, flapping sails and one is broken lying on the deck.

ways.from: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: plank
ways.description: an old plank connection the deck of the ship with the cliff

ways.from: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: door
ways.description: a door blocked by a fallen mast

items.name: sail cloth
items.description: a large, torn part of the sail

items.name: rope
items.description: part of the rigging is still in tact and can be used as a rope

items.name: saber
items.description: old rusty saber

rooms.name: ship interior
rooms.description:
You're in the ships interior. You smell decaying wood and rotten fish. 
You enter a room that looks like the captains cabin. In the middle of the cabin is a table barely standing on three legs.

ways.to: Deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: door
ways.description: a door blocked by a fallen mast

ways.name: hole
ways.description: a hole in the the ship hull

items.name: telescope
items.description: an rusty, old telescope but still working

items.name: nautical map
items.description: an old, nautical map with an island marked on it

items.name: compass
items.description: a small, old compass

rooms.name: Beach below the cliff
rooms.description:
Your at a small beach enclosed by boulders and the cliff. The sea is clear and you can see the sunken ships through the surface. 
The waves are crashing against the boulders on ether side. It seams the the there must be a reef before the small beach, since the waves in this area are almost non existent.

ways.name: hole
ways.description: a short climb about boulder to the hole in the ship hull

ways.name: sea
ways.description: a short swim and dive to the sunk ship wreck

ways.to: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: cave
ways.description: big cave in the cliff

items.name: life jacket
items.description: an orange life jacket, that looks like it spend some time in the water

rooms.name: Sunken ships in the sea
rooms.description:
Close to the surface of the sea are many ship wreaks. There are many different sorts of fish swimming in the ships, which are overgrown with sea life. 
You can see a drop where the sea goes from shallow plunging in the depths. The ship wreaks are within diving range. 
You dive to the closest ship wreak.

ways.name: sea
ways.description: emerge from the depth and swim to shore

items.name: small treasure box
items.description: a small treasure box, that looks like it might contain something priceless

rooms.name: giant rabbit hole
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a gigantic hole under the earth and feel like 
Alice in Wonderland. On the walls are some roots hanging out and in the 
corner you can discover a soft bed of grass. Maybe you've landed in 
the Easter Bunny's apartment...

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: little earthworm tunnel
ways.description: little earthworm tunnel

ways.name: a hole in the ceiling
ways.description: a hole in the ceiling going up

rooms.name: Hidden cave
rooms.description:
You ended up in some kind of lumber room. Apparently, people used to hide their 
secrets here and store various things. Judging by the destroyed shelves 
and all the broken glass, these treasures have already been stolen.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: Trapdoor in the ceiling
ways.description: Trapdoor in the ceiling

items.name: sharp sparkling shard of glass
items.description: a sharp sparkling shard of glass

rooms.name: Living room of a torturer
rooms.description:
A large, sparsely furnished living room, which apparently also serves as a bedroom 
and kitchen. There is only a table, covered with crumbs, with a chair and a bed 
of straw. On the floor you will find countless crushed insects in all colours and 
shapes. The shells, legs and antennae of these animals are twisted in unnatural 
positions, which they could not possibly have taken voluntarily.

ways.name: trapdoor under the carpet
ways.description: trapdoor under the carpet

ways.to: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: hole in the wall
ways.description: hole in the wall

items.name: large beetle with a flattened carapace
items.description: a large beetle with a flattened carapace

rooms.name: Secret Grotto
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a beautiful room that is bathed in warm colours 
by incident light. In the middle of the room is a warm pool, which with its 
steaming water calls for a relaxing bath. Next to it there are some deck chairs, 
and even a palm tree has found its way here. In the distance you can hear the 
sound of a waterfall and you wonder if this place was created by fairies.

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: way
ways.description: way description

ways.name: stone way
ways.description: stone way

ways.name: wooden staircase
ways.description: a wooden staircase leading up

items.name: small water lily
items.description: small water lily
items.place: is swimming in the centre of the pool

rooms.name: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
rooms.description:
You're in a cave with ochre walls. 
As you remove the dust, you can see something that looks like paintings from the stone age. The paintings 
show different hunting scenes with huge mammoths and sabre-toothed tigers. 
You are struck by the beauty of these old paintings.
From the west you can smell the salty scent of sea water.

ways.from: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: hole in the floor
ways.description: A dark tunnel.

ways.from: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: cave
ways.description: a little cave

items.name: human skull
items.description: human skull that feels a little greasy. The shape of the skull is very different from what you are used to from the mirror and reminds you more of a monkey than a human.

rooms.name: Crossroads bat
rooms.description:
You're standing at a major underground crossroads, mysteriously 
the floor is quite warm, but never mind. 
When you look up you can understand where the name of this room comes from: The whole cave ceiling is 
covered by bats of different shapes and sizes. It looks like they are sleeping, so shhhh 
- you don't want to wake the bats.

ways.name: large brick passageway
ways.description: large brick passageway

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: stone staircase

items.name: dead bat, neither eaten, stinking or rotting
items.description: don't even think of eating that uncooked you'll make the whole world stay at home

rooms.name: Room under crossroads bat I
rooms.description:
You're in a rectangular chamber. It's really hot 
and sweat is dripping from your forehead. It feels like every one of your clothes is just soaked 
with sweat.  If you look to the west you can see the reason: The room is divided in two by a red-hot 
lava flow. The river is bubbling and hissing, and you have to be careful that your clothes don't 
catch fire.

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: stone staircase

ways.name: way over lava stream
ways.description: way - only use with ladder etc...

rooms.name: Room under crossroads bat II
rooms.description:
You're in a rectangular chamber. It's really hot 
and sweat is dripping from your forehead. It feels like every one of your clothes is just soaked 
with sweat.  If you look to the east you can see the reason: The room is divided in two by a red-hot 
lava flow. The river is bubbling and hissing, and you have to be careful that your clothes don't 
catch fire.

ways.name: heavy door
ways.description: door leading to troll room

ways.name: way over lava stream
ways.description: way - only use with ladder etc...

rooms.name: Butcher's Room II
rooms.description:
You are in an enormous hall divided in two. The walls are tiled in red in a strange way and 
there are several drains in the floor. Strange... When you look at the walls, you'll notice 
that there are various sharp tools everywhere, from butchers knives to swords to saws. 
Scratching the walls, you'll notice that the red is not the color of the tiles, but dried 
blood...

ways.name: heavy door
ways.description: door leading to room under crossroads bat II

ways.name: a big passage to the second half of the room
ways.description: way - only use with ladder etc...

ways.description: a big trapdoor

rooms.description:
You are in an enormous hall divided in two. The walls are tiled in red in a strange way and 
there are several drains in the floor. Strange... When you look at the walls, you'll notice 
that there are various sharp tools everywhere, from butchers knives to swords to saws. 
Scratching the walls, you'll notice that the red is not the color of the tiles, but dried 
blood...

ways.description: locked door

rooms.name: hidden dungeon
rooms.description:
You look into a small cell, it's cold and musty. The walls are scratched and covered with 
paintings, it looks like the last inmates in here have lost their minds. There is a small 
hole in the floor, obviously for food, and in the corner there is a bucket for the rubbish.

ways.name: discrete little hatch
ways.description: discrete little hatch

rooms.name: cave with nothing but three ways
rooms.description: You are in a cave with nothing but three ways and a trapdoor. There is really nothing in this cave except three ways and a trapdoor.

ways.name: a big trapdoor in the ceiling, too big to miss

ways.description: way

rooms.name: magical cave
rooms.description:
You're in a round cave. There is total silence. It's so peaceful, everything's even. 
Light from the middle of the ceiling bathes the room in a pleasant light. You imagine 
that you could stay here forever...

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

items.name: a giant statue of buddah
items.description: too heavy to take, shimmering in the light

rooms.name: holy grotto
rooms.description:
You're in the middle of a big cave. There are stalactites hanging from the ceiling and 
the floor is littered with stalagmites. You hear the regular dripping of water from 
the top to the bottom. This is accompanied by the quiet omm of an old, wise monk 
in the middle of the cave.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

rooms.name: mineral cave
rooms.description:
You're standing in the middle of a coal mine. A fixed oil lamp illuminates the mining area. The air is stuffy and dusty. 
At the edges you can see different heaps of rocks that have apparently been blasted out of the wall.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: way

items.name: small lump of coal
items.description: there is nothing special about this lump of coal

items.name: big lump of coal
items.description: there is nothing special about this lump of coal

items.name: lump of coal of medium size
items.description: there is nothing special about this lump of coal

rooms.name: Crossroads ape
rooms.description:
You're standing in the middle of a big crossroads. The walls are just clay and stone, 
covered with a strange pattern and you wonder why the ceiling doesn't fall on your head. 
You question whether it's only you or whether others before you have had the same thought. 
On closer inspection you notice that the patterns on the wall are primitive drawings of 
apes. Despite the age and the dirt, they are still clearly visible on closer inspection, 
impressive...

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: a stone staircase going up

ways.name: railway
ways.description: later: use railway item

rooms.name: archaeological chamber
rooms.description:
You're in a chamber that for some reason has an electric 
light on. It looks like someone's been here recently. There's all kinds of archaeological equipment 
scattered around the room. A cupboard with books containing the history of first men has to be implemented.

ways.to: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: hole in the ceiling
ways.description: hole in the ceiling

ways.name: large brick passageway
ways.description: large brick passageway

rooms.name: Pillaged armory
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a looted armory. Through the flickering light of 
torches you can dimly see some stands for armour. A few individual pieces of armour 
lie scattered, broken and rusted on the floor. By looking closer you can see that 
nobody has been here for a while, the armor stands and the broken armor pieces are covered 
with a thick layer of dust.

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: a stone staircase going down

ways.name: hole
ways.description: hole in the wall

items.name: iron ingot
items.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

items.name: iron ingot
items.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

items.name: iron ingot
items.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

items.name: iron ingot
items.description: An iron ingot. Maybe you can create something with it.

rooms.name: Earthworm tunnel
rooms.description:
A small tunnel that feels like it was dug by an oversized earthworm. 
In the absence of light, you can feel the wet, damp earth surrounding 
you in far too many places on your body. Thank God you haven't eaten 
much since you arrived at the beach, otherwise you would be stuck down 
here forever. Slowly you feel the walls coming closer and closer to you 
from all sides. Either you are claustrophobic or the walls are actually 
moving, but in both cases it's time to leave the tunnel!

ways.name: small door
ways.description: a small door

ways.name: little earthworm tunnel
ways.description: little earthworm tunnel

rooms.name: Cave with underground river
rooms.description:
You're standing in a dark cave that smells like rotten fish. Your feet are wet and cold and you feel something muddy. 
It looks like you are standing in the middle of an underground river. But when you take a closer look you notice 
that it consists only of garbage, garbage and sewage. Man, it stinks!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: ladder leading to cave on the beach

ways.name: a  dry way out of this cave
ways.description: a dry way out of this cave

items.name: old tattered leather shoe
items.description: decomposed by the water and many sweaty feat

items.name: old rusty and bent knife
items.description: better suited for poisoning than stabbing
items.place: lying on the ground of the river

items.name: old ampoule full of fermented wine, mixed with brackish water
items.description: lying there a few years or for decades, the wine is undrinkable
items.place: lying on the ground of the river, partly covered with mud

items.name: large gnawed rotten brown bone of an animal
items.description: it smells so disusting that you have absolutely no desire to touch it
items.place: swimming on the surface of the river

rooms.name: Locker room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a small cave that is apparently used as a 
changing room. The floor is tiled and heated, and on the walls are small cabins for changing.

ways.name: way
ways.description: way

ways.name: way
ways.description: way, description is to define

items.name: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink
items.description: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink

rooms.name: Killer Sauna
rooms.description:
The room is dark and hardly lit. Suddenly you feel so warm and it's so hard to 
breathe. The air is hot and stuffy, the sweat is running off your forehead. 
You slowly notice how your vision disappears and your eyes turn black. It's 
much too hot in here, even for a sauna. Get out of here!

rooms.description: You are in a house at the village with some natives in it.

rooms.name: sacrificial altar
rooms.description: You are standing in front of an sacrificial altar where people can make a sacrifice for the forgiveness of their sins.

ways.name: path to the village
ways.description: A path going downwards to the village.

ways.name: path to the vulcan
ways.description: A narrow and very steep path going upwards to the vulcan. If you go up here, it can get very hot.

items.name: potion
items.description: A little glass bottle with a purple liquid in it. Could be a potion with a magic effect.

items.name: altar cloth
items.description: A white, large piece of textile used to decorate the altar.

rooms.name: vulcan
rooms.description: You are standing on a vulcan. In front of you there is the crater with the seething lava in it.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A narrow and very steep path going down to the sacrificial altar. If you go down this path, it will get cooler.

rooms.name: beginning of the forest
rooms.description:
You find yourself at the beginning of a forest. 
There are different noises coming from the inside. They do not sound friendly. 
There is a sign leading inside the forest which leads to an old house.

ways.name: path
ways.description: You are taking the path leading inside the forest. The noises are getting louder and louder!

ways.name: path outside the forest
ways.description: A path leading outside the forest.

items.name: liana
items.description: A liana hanging from a tree. It seems to be as strong as a rope.

items.name: pile of leaves
items.description: A pile of leaves with something under it.

rooms.name: forest path
rooms.description:
A path with trees and a small tree house. 
It does not look to stable but should be barely enough to lift yourself. 
To the north is a powering river with a tiger in front of it!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A broken ladder to the tree house. There is a step lying on the ground but the nails are missing.

ways.name: path
ways.description: You are going back to the beginning of the forest. The noises are getting more and more quiet and you feel relieved.

ways.name: bridge made of a cut tree
ways.description: You are balancing above the tree which was cut to get over the powering river.

items.name: step from the tree house
items.description: A step from the tree house which could be used to get up.

items.name: berrys
items.description: Some berrys which seme suspicious.

items.name: rusty curved nails
items.description: Some rusty curved nails which can not be used anymore.

rooms.name: tree house
rooms.description:
You find yourself inside the tree house which is pretty high above the ground. 
You decide to better not look down. The wood is creaking under you!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You take the ladder down the tree house. You climb very slowly to make sure you don´t fall down.

ways.name: liana
ways.description: You hold yourself very tight on the liana to swing above the powering river.

items.name: empty water bottle
items.description: An empty water bottle which is very robust.
items.place: is lying on a small table

items.name: rotten apple
items.description: A rotten apple with a worm looking out.

items.name: pair of shoes
items.description: A pair of shoes looking like the owner forgot them. They got the initials G. E. written inside.

rooms.name: forest path with four directions
rooms.description: You reached a forest fork which leads to four directions.

ways.name: path
ways.description: You take the way leading to an old house in the forest.

ways.name: path
ways.description: You are taking the way to a ruin which you can see in the distance.

ways.name: a long path
ways.description: You are taking a long path. On that path are many footsteps which tells you that this path is often used.

ways.name: bridge made of a cut tree
ways.description: You are balancing above the tree which was cut to get over the powering river to get to the side with the tree house.

items.name: fish
items.description: A caught fish
items.place: is hanging on a fishing rod

items.name: broken fishing rod
items.description: A broken fishing rod which can no longer be used.

items.name: broken vase
items.description: A broken vase which was used to transport water.

rooms.name: in front the old house
rooms.description:
You are in front the old house. You can see some  footsteps leading inside. 
There could be a person inside the house which you can´t see because of the barricaded windows. You should better watch out.

ways.name: door
ways.description: You go inside the old house by using the leaning door infront the house.

ways.name: path
ways.description: You go away from the house.

items.name: pile of wood
items.description: A pile of wood
items.place: is lying next to the old house

items.name: abandoned beehive
items.description: A beehive without honey or bees.
items.place: is lying next to a tree.

rooms.name: old house in the forest
rooms.description: It seems like a small house. You hear someone screaming for help from the cellar!!

ways.to: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You take a ladder down the cellar.

ways.name: door
ways.description: You are leaving the house.

items.description: A sharp axe which could cut a tree.

items.description: A diary from someone.

items.description: A small bag full of gold.
items.place: is lying on a old wooden table

items.description: A deliciously smelling bread.
items.place: is lying on a old wooden table

rooms.name: cellar of the old house in the forest
rooms.description: A cellar with a torture chamber and a pile of wood. You see a person tied to a rack. He seems very scared!

ways.from: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You take the ladder to get out of the cellar.

ways.from: cellar of the old house in the forest

ways.description: You go inside a hole leading to the living room of a torturer.

items.description: A whip made of leather

items.description: A chest with something in it.

items.description: A mask which helps to dive.

rooms.description: It is a delerict building. It was abandoned ages ago.

ways.description: An archway leading into the building.

ways.name: path

ways.description: A path leading to a court with scattered debris.

rooms.description: You see some scattered fragments of the building. Some of them have inscriptions.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A path you can recognize from the deciphered inscription

items.description: The chestplate is decorated with valuable gems.

rooms.name: ruins basement
rooms.description: It was once an impressing building, but after centuries, there isn't much left.

ways.description: An archway leading outside.

ways.description: An archway leading back.

ways.name: bricks
ways.description: Multiple bricks protrude from the wall, enabling a bold climb to the top of the ruin.

items.name: rusty iron sword
items.description: The sword looks a bit fragile, but should last a couple of hits.

rooms.name: ruins top
rooms.description: Up from here, you can see far.

ways.name: descent
ways.description: A dangerous descent to the basement.

items.name: grass

items.name: flowers
items.description: The weadow is full of beautiful flowers in all colors.

characters.name: young girl
characters.situation: A young girl is sitting on the weadow crying.
characters.intro: I can't find my cat Findus. He run away and I searched him everywhere, but he disappeared.

ways.name: into the pond
ways.description: the bank in front of you is very flat

characters.name: elder lady
characters.situation: An elder lady is siiting on a bench and enjoys the sun.
characters.intro: What a sunny day. It's such a warm sommer. I really like the flowers.

rooms.name: pond
rooms.description: You're in the middle of the pond. You can see a waterfall splashing into the water.

ways.name: swim towards shore
ways.description: The shore seams to be a lot saver.

ways.name: swim towards waterfall
ways.description: the waterfall looks dangerous. Sure you want to risk your life?

ways.name: diving
ways.description: Maybe you can dive to the ground

rooms.name: bottom of the pond
rooms.description: There's water all around you. You can't see anything.

ways.name: diving

rooms.name: waterfall
rooms.description: the water foams and creates little waves

ways.name: swim towards the pond
ways.description: the water over there looks calmer

ways.description: Directly in front of you the waterfall is splashing into the pond.

ways.name: through the waterfall
ways.description: Directly in front of you the waterfall is splashing into the pond.

rooms.name: chapel
